snippet: Gunmen killed a senior Egyptian security official whose responsibilities included investigating Muslim extremists, the Interior Ministry said Monday.
abstract: Gunmen in Cairo kill Lt Col Mohamed Mabrouk, senior Egyptian security official whose responsibilities included investigating Muslim extremists.
lead_paragraph: Gunmen killed a senior Egyptian security official whose responsibilities included investigating Muslim extremists, the Interior Ministry said Monday.
